author: genspring
msg: GERONIMO-5059 unicast-based support failover for stateless session bean.
1, Added a clusterdStatelessContainer for SLSB failover.
2, Modified the openejb cluster wadi builder to handle the stateless bean.
3, Reorg the package for easier extensions.

author: jbohn
msg: ARIES-200 update AriesTrader to support depoyment of EBAs in the equinox assemblies - also update the building of the EBAs to push them to the local maven repo

author: brett
msg: set the PermGen size needed and move cargo install out of target so it doesn't get re-downloaded
